attributes.action: Run a campaign to re-educate road users as to which is the correct lane to approach roundabouts in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasingly I am almost run off the road by inconsiderate road users who approach roundabouts in the left hand land when they intend to turn right.  It is not a difficult concept left lane for left turn or straight on, right lane for right turning.  A police vehicle did it to me the other day!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
